<!DOCTYPE html>
        <script src="//hangoutsapi.appspot.com/static/hangout.js"></script>
        <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.6.4/jquery.min.js"></script>
      	<script>
		  var tabs = new gadgets.TabSet(__MODULE_ID__, "Two"); 
		  function init() {
		  	var participants = gapi.hangout.getParticipants();
			$.each(participants, function(index, participant) {
			  var tabId = tabs.addTab(participant.displayName);
			  var gplusId = participant.id;
			  $.get('https://www.googleapis.com/plus/v1/people/' + gplusId + '?key=AIzaSyB14Ua7k5_wusxHTQEH3sqmglO7MHjHPCI&alt=json', function(data){
  				$(tabId).html(JSON.stringify(data, null, '\n'));
  				console.log(data);
  		      }, "jsonp");
			  //$(tabId).html(value);
			})
		  }
		  
		  gapi.hangout.addApiReadyListener(function(){
		    init()
		  });
	    </script>
